name: Team 8 - Deliver Or Die
description:
Zombie apocalypse or not, you still got to eat right?

Steve is a young boy who works extra as a pizza delivery boy. The working conditions are harsh, to say the least, and zombies are coming from every direction. It seems they are triggered by the delicious smell of fresh baked pizza...

In this 2d sidescroller you play as the delivery boy Steve, who bravely puts his neck on the line to deliver first class pizza to his customers.

This game is a part of the International Educations Game Jam.

Credits Team 08:

  • Lars Olsson : Artist
  • Noortje Schuur : Artist
  • Kelly van Peer : Artist
  • Daniel Nielsen : Programmer
  • Onne Krol : Programmer
  • Gabriel Matos Moura Da Silva : Programmer

Sound and music by:

AShamaluevMusic 
https://www.dl-sounds.com/royalty-free/horuna/
https://www.scottbuckley.com.au/library/skyscraper-samba/

WebGL Version (password pizza):

https://dannneman.itch.io/deliver-or-die-webgl
